name: Burg_315
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with loanwords from Island Creole
diet heavy on smoked fish and seaweed
local crafts: talismans and ritual gear
constraints: No instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
notes: Navigational auguries used but charts and seamanship still required
Combustion industry limited; workshops are small-scale
